title: Spanish-inspired Display typeface
content:
Dear all,

this is my first attempt at type creation as an amateur type designer.  
I would love to hear from you,

Do not hesitate to criticise!

| --- | --- |

author: stelio effrena

comments.content: I would look at the upper counter of the B.
C, G, O, Q, D on line four, in to small than other. you can copy the stress from 5 to 6, 9
